inputs.remark:
Rank 1: "Unilateral utricular dysfunction" 应改为 "Right unilateral utricular dysfunction"。
Rank 2: "Migraine or small vessel disease" 删除（MRI偶发发现的影像学鉴别，非患者症状鉴别）。
Rank 3: "Arnold-Chiari malformation" 删除。
Ordered list 缺少：MRI brain with/without contrast；Neurotologic physical examination；Laboratory studies (CBC, comprehensive metabolic panel, thyroid panel, sedimentation rate)。

logic_summary: Updated Rank 1 diagnosis label to 'Right unilateral utricular dysfunction'.
Removed Rank 2 (Migraine) and Rank 3 (Arnold-Chiari) as they were excluded or incidental findings.
Added MRI, Laboratory studies, and Neurotologic physical examination to the ordered list in chronological order based on the case description.

value.label: Right unilateral utricular dysfunction
value.rationale_short: Specific deficit on DSVV testing (lack of tilt change with right utricular stimulation) consistent with symptoms during high-velocity leftward turns.
Rule out central pathology; previous MRI showed nonspecific T2 signal alterations.

value.action: Laboratory studies (CBC, comprehensive metabolic panel, thyroid panel, sedimentation rate)
value.rationale_short: Rule out metabolic or systemic causes of dizziness.
Assess vital signs, cranial nerves, and basic vestibular function before specialized testing.
